GitHub Pages Setup Guide

This guide explains how to set up and deploy the seroCOP documentation website using GitHub Pages and pkgdown.

Quick Setup

1. Build Site Locally (Optional)

# Install pkgdown if needed
install.packages("pkgdown")

# Build the site
pkgdown::build_site()

# Preview in browser
pkgdown::preview_site()

Or use the convenience script:

Rscript build_site.R

2. Push to GitHub

git add .
git commit -m "Add pkgdown configuration and GitHub Actions"
git push origin main

3. Enable GitHub Pages

  1. Go to your repository on GitHub
  2. Click Settings > Pages (in left sidebar)
  3. Under “Build and deployment”:
    • Source: GitHub Actions
  4. The workflow will automatically build and deploy your site

4. Access Your Site

Once deployed, your site will be available at:

https://USERNAME.github.io/seroCOP/

Replace USERNAME with your GitHub username in _pkgdown.yml.

What’s Included

The pkgdown site automatically generates:

  • Home page from README.md
  • Function reference from roxygen2 documentation
  • Vignettes/Articles:
    • Simulation and Recovery
    • Multi-Biomarker Analysis
  • News from NEWS.md (if present)

Customization

Update the URL

Edit _pkgdown.yml and replace USERNAME:

url: https://YOUR_GITHUB_USERNAME.github.io/seroCOP/

Also update the GitHub link:

github:
  icon: fab fa-github fa-lg
  href: https://github.com/YOUR_GITHUB_USERNAME/seroCOP

Change Theme

Edit the template section in _pkgdown.yml:

template:
  bootstrap: 5
  bootswatch: flatly  # Try: cerulean, cosmo, darkly, etc.

Add More Vignettes

Just create new .Rmd files in vignettes/ and they’ll automatically appear in the Articles menu.

GitHub Actions Workflow

The workflow (.github/workflows/pkgdown.yaml) automatically:

  1. Triggers on:

    • Push to main/master branch
    • Pull requests
    • Manual dispatch
    • New releases

  2. Builds the pkgdown site

  3. Deploys to gh-pages branch

  4. GitHub Pages serves from gh-pages branch

Troubleshooting

Site not updating

  1. Check the Actions tab on GitHub to see if workflow succeeded
  2. Check that GitHub Pages is set to use GitHub Actions
  3. Wait 1-2 minutes for deployment to complete

Build errors

Check the workflow logs in the Actions tab. Common issues: - Missing dependencies in DESCRIPTION - Errors in vignettes - Invalid _pkgdown.yml syntax

Local build issues

# Update pkgdown
install.packages("pkgdown")

# Clean and rebuild
pkgdown::clean_site()
pkgdown::build_site()

Manual Deployment (Alternative)

If you prefer not to use GitHub Actions:

# Build site
pkgdown::build_site()

# Deploy to GitHub Pages
usethis::use_github_pages()

Then push the docs/ folder to your repository.

On this page
